frc3128.EventManager

Class ListenerManager

extends Object
    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public static void addListener(Event event,
               String key)
        Adds an Event and key to the Listener system. This has the effect of triggering the Event once whenever the key is invoked.
        Parameters:
        event - the Event to be added to the ListenerManager
        key - the String key with which the Event should be associated

      • addListener

        public static void addListener(Event event,
               int key)
        Adds an Event and key to the Listener system. This has the effect of triggering the Event once whenever the key is invoked.
        Parameters:
        event - the Event to be added to the ListenerManager
        key - the integer key with which the Event should be associated

      • callListener

        public static void callListener(String key)
        Calls all Events associated with the given key. The Events will be run once. They will be kept in the ListenerManager's index.
        Parameters:
        key - the String key whose associated Events should be run

      • callListener

        public static void callListener(int link)
        Calls all Events associated with the given key. The Events will be run once. They will be kept in the ListenerManager's index.
        Parameters:
        link - the integer key whose associated Events should be run

      • dropEvent

        public static void dropEvent(Event event)
        Removes all Event/key pairs from the Listener table whose Event matches the one provided. This Event will no longer be called until it is re-added.
        Parameters:
        event - The Event to be dropped

      • dropEventType

        public static void dropEventType(Class c)
        Removes all Event/key pairs from the listener table whose class type is of the one provided. This is considerably slower than dropping an Event, so should be used sparingly.
        Parameters:
        c - The class to be dropped.

      • dropListener

        public static void dropListener(String key)
        Drops all Event/key pairs with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the String key to be dropped from the table.

      • dropListener

        public static void dropListener(int key)
        Drops all Event/key pairs with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the integer key to be dropped from the table.

      • dropAllListeners

        public static void dropAllListeners()
        Clears the entire Listener table.
